sql:
SELECT l.name AS language, AVG(c.overall_score) AS avg_overall_score
FROM languages l
JOIN official_languages ol ON l.id = ol.language_id
JOIN countries c ON ol.country_id = c.id
GROUP BY l.name
ORDER BY avg_overall_score DESC;
question: Show the official languages sorted in descending order by the average overall scores among countries speaking them.

sql:
SELECT languages.name, AVG(countries.overall_score) AS average_overall_score
FROM official_languages
JOIN countries ON official_languages.country_id = countries.id
JOIN languages ON official_languages.language_id = languages.id
GROUP BY languages.name
ORDER BY average_overall_score DESC
question: Show the official languages sorted in descending order by the average overall scores among countries speaking them.

sql:
SELECT languages.name, AVG(countries.overall_score) AS avg_overall_score
FROM official_languages
JOIN countries ON official_languages.country_id = countries.id
JOIN languages ON official_languages.language_id = languages.id
GROUP BY languages.name
ORDER BY avg_overall_score DESC;
question: Show the official languages sorted in descending order by the average overall scores among countries speaking them.

sql:
SELECT 
  languages.name, 
  AVG(countries.overall_score) AS avg_overall_score
FROM 
  languages
JOIN 
  official_languages ON languages.id = official_languages.language_id
JOIN 
  countries ON official_languages.country_id = countries.id
GROUP BY 
  languages.name
ORDER BY 
  avg_overall_score DESC;
question: Show the official languages sorted in descending order by the average overall scores among countries speaking them.

sql:
SELECT 
    l.name AS language_name,
    AVG(c.overall_score) AS avg_overall_score
FROM 
    languages l
JOIN 
    official_languages ol ON l.id = ol.language_id
JOIN 
    countries c ON ol.country_id = c.id
GROUP BY 
    l.name
ORDER BY 
    avg_overall_score DESC;
question: Show the official languages sorted in descending order by the average overall scores among countries speaking them.
